titles.title: A bill relating to the treatment of certain State plans under section 72(e) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/25/1988--Introduced. Amends the Tax Reform Act of 1986 to create a special rule for the income tax treatment of amounts received, but not as an annuity, under an annuity, endowment, or life insurance contract in connection with certain State plans permitting employee withdrawals of their contributions.
